entry.title: Easily connect to postgres via proxy with service - #workflow
entry.summary:
~/.ssh/config add something like Host prod.client User ubuntu Hostname prod-ec2-instance.example.com LocalForward localhost:5433 rds-gibberish.us-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432 IdentityFile ~/production-ec2-key.pem pg service ~/.pg_service.conf save the user, database name, and password [client-prod] host=localhost port=5433 user=rds-user dbname=client-production password=blablabla ssh prod.client pg_dump, psql, etc.) in another: psql service=client-prod
warning
Well you just saved a production password to a plain text file, and now you can easily connect and muck things up in production. Make sure your machine is secure and be careful and stuff.

entry.title: Copy pathname in MacOS finder - #workflow
entry.summary: right-clicking on the file and then holding down the option key. You will then see an option to copy the file/folder's pathname.

entry.title: You can turn arrays into sentences! - #rails
entry.summary:
Array#to_sentence that turns your array into a string in sentence format. superheroes = ["Spider-Man", "Batman", "Iron man", "Wonder woman"]
superheroes.to_sentence => "Spider-Man, Batman, Iron man, and Wonder woman"
superheroes.to_sentence( words_connector: " or ", last_word_connector: " or maybe even " ) => "Spider-Man or Batman or Iron man or maybe even Wonder woman" docs!

17 Apr 2023
entry.summary:
Neovim Core updates Updates of Neovim itself, which are available on Neovim nightly. Important: some updates might be missing from this week content. If you want to be sure to always keep up to date with whats going on in Neovim Core, you are strongly advised to have a look to these places: @neovim on Twitter, which tweets the most recent news about the editor. :h news.txt will deliver you with the last news inside Neovim directly. Various PRs on GitHub. Neovim Plugin Community updates Neovim is full of active plugins. This section is about the community and what is going on. Guides, tours, articles, etc.
Dotfyle.com - Discover and share Neovim configs
Introducing Dotfyle: a website to discover and share neovim configs. How does it work? Sign up with GitHub and sync

entry.title: Disable gemrc configuration - #ruby
entry.summary: configuration of your rubygems via the .gemrc file but now you want to bypass that. --norc flag will do just that: gem install decent_exposure --norc .gemrc will be ignored. Rubygems documentation

entry.title: Don't auto generate Gem documentation in Ruby - #ruby
entry.summary: .gemrc if you don't already have one and add: gem: --no-document --no-ri & --no-rdoc, however --no-document takes care of both. gem documentation for more info

entry.summary:
Neovim Core updates Updates of Neovim itself, which are available on Neovim nightly. Important: some updates might be missing from this week content. If you want to be sure to always keep up to date with whats going on in Neovim Core, you are strongly advised to have a look to these places: @neovim on Twitter, which tweets the most recent news about the editor. :h news.txt will deliver you with the last news inside Neovim directly. Various PRs on GitHub. #22668 adds lua-loader. A builtin Lua module which byte-compiles and caches Lua files (speeds up load times). To enable, add vim.loader.enable() to your init.lua. Neovim Plugin Community updates Neovim is full of active plugins. This section is about the community and what is going on. Need help
